universal-robots-tool-comm-forwarder-too.title: Tool Communication Forwarder
universal-robots-tool-comm-forwarder-too.supportiveText: URCap to forward tool communication to the network

description.line1: URCapX to support relaying the RS-485 communication device in a UR robot to a remote PC.
description.line2: It starts a socat server to relay the tool communication device to the network socket on port 54321.

socat-server.server-running-text: Socat server is running on port 54321 forwarding tool communication to the network. This state is persisted and remains unchanged after a restart.
socat-server.server-stopped-text: Socat server not running. This state is persisted and remains unchanged after a restart.
